QuestData.Title: Prying Eyes
QuestData.Description:
The Constructs would repurpose the carcass of our necropolis. But we will need its parts for our own ends.
Let us deliver a warning to these scavengers.
Slay the Constructs amid our wreckage. Pluck the eyes from their skulls. Such is our signature.
They will know to fear the darkness once more.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Betrayer's Eyes from constructs in Akarek's Tears.
QuestData.RewardText: I see cowardice in these eyes. You have done well.
